cells.name: The Entrance Hall
cells.description: Welcome to the game, you are in a bright entrance hall. No sign of bunnies.

cells.name: The Hallway
cells.description: You are in a square hallway with a checkered floor pattern and a large statue of Winston Churchill.

cells.name: North Wing
cells.description: You entered the north wing area and are standing in a wide room filled with comfy sofas.

cells.name: The Dinner
cells.description: You are in a large open space with fake leather booths and tables, as well as metal serving counter top. There is a faint smell of Huevos Rancheros.

cells.name: Music Room
cells.description: The room you are in is lined with large racks of 45" LPs from the 60’s and 70s.
cells.puzzle: This thing has no varying side-effects.

cells.name: The Library
cells.description: This long room has a high ceiling and walkways all around the edge. Books line all the shelves and a small movable ladder allows you to move up and down to get books you’d like to read.

cells.name: The Movie Room
cells.description: You stumble into a dimly lit space with a large curved screen and a row of projectors at the back. 20 plush seats are grouped in the center of the room.
cells.puzzle: How did you walk before you Swaggered?

cells.name: Rabbit gallery
cells.description: This is a round room with ornate paintings of giant rabbits lining the walls. Gentle sunlight plays in from up above to illuminate the space. Still no real rabbits….

cells.name: Statue room
cells.description: This large room is much longer than it is wide and houses an impressive collection of rabbit statues - each in a different pose.

cells.name: Aquarium Room
cells.description: This room makes you feel like you are in a giant fishtank. Walking under the glass ceiling and between the columns you can see 100’s of fish flitting about on the other side.
cells.puzzle: Body creating the new description format on the block!

cells.name: Great Hall
cells.description: You are in a long hall with a huge dinning table surrounded by formal chairs.
cells.puzzle: Known to be the Cadmus of APIs.

cells.name: Art Room
cells.description: This room is dominated by a single painting which looks to be the original Mona Lisa. Nice find, but where are the rabbits?

cells.name: Surveillance Room
cells.description: This room features a bank of monitors, all showing random static. On closer inspection, the cables have all been chewed through by rabbit teeth.

cells.name: Phone Room
cells.description: This room contains 20 phone booths, all with different labels but no way to dial a number.

cells.name: Ante Room
cells.description: This room contains all the materials needed to serve dinner in the Great Hall.

cells.name: Arnold's Room
cells.description: The room is covered in pictures of a pig dressed in various different costumes.

cells.name: Dancefloor
cells.description:
This star shaped room is long and wide with a large square raised dance floor in the center.
There is also a GLOWING DOOR in the center of the room and as you approach, a soft voice asks you - "What’s the password?".

cells.name: Ping Pong Room
cells.description: This room contains a single well worn Ping Pong table. The paint on the walls is scuffed and marked from one too many enthusiastic impacts.

cells.name: Table football room
cells.description: Someone has stolen the table football table.

cells.name: Darts Room
cells.description: The electronic darts machine in this room is flashing its lights for the next player. But the rabbit hunt spurs you on!

cells.name: Shuffleboard Room
cells.description: The wooden shuffleboard is in good order in the middle of the room.

cells.name: Pool Room
cells.description: You’re in a large courtyard filled with sun loungers and a 25m swimming pool. The Jacuzzi looks inviting, but the rabbit quest is more important.

cells.name: Locker Room
cells.description: This room contains showers, benches, lockers and ways to change your clothes before swimming.

cells.name: Slims
cells.description: This room contains a large number of disco glitter balls, a dance floor and impressive speakers
cells.puzzle: AJAX best friend to travel between distant locations

cells.name: Coffee station
cells.description: This room features a complex professional expresso machine so intimidating you feel an urge to move on.

cells.name: Patio
cells.description: This room opens to a small garden with pleasant sunlight and a number of tables to enjoy coffee at.

cells.name: Bathroom
cells.description: You’re in the bathroom. Yep - No rabbits here…

cells.name: Closet
cells.description: This room is full of coats, boots and other exterior clothing. There’s possibly an umbrella somewhere in here.

cells.name: Surf Room
cells.description: This room is stacked wall to wall with surf boards and Dr. Zog’s Wax.

cells.name: Clue room
cells.description: This room is not exciting except for the fact that: you can get a clue

cells.name: Solitaire Room
cells.description: Lots of decks of cards lie scattered on tables, each with one chair standing nearby.

cells.name: Flower Room
cells.description: This room has flower arrangements all around the walls.

cells.name: Dull Room
cells.description: Nope, nothing here.

cells.name: Observation Bubble
cells.description: This room contains a spiral staircase upwards into a clear observation bubble from which you can see far over the surrounding countryside.
cells.puzzle: The collective conscience of the API world.

cells.name: Spiral Room
cells.description: This room has a domed ceiling painted in swirling bright colors. Rabbit motifs are plastered on the walls.
cells.puzzle: Want to feel secure? Implement it.
